      • getSparseDataset

        protected Learner.SparseDataset getSparseDataset(Instances instances,
                                                 boolean normalize)
        Returns the column-oriented format of sparse dataset. This method automatically removes attributes with close-to-zero variance.
        Parameters:
        instances - the instances.
        normalize - true if all the columns are normalized.
        Returns:
        the column-oriented format of sparse dataset.

      • getDenseDataset

        Returns the column-oriented format of dense dataset. This method automatically removes attributes with close-to-zero variance.
        Parameters:
        instances - the instances.
        normalize - true if all the columns are normalized.
        Returns:
        the column-oriented format of dense dataset.
